channel.title: Project-Xelios 718/742
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i1261.photobucket.com/albums/ii588/Ovarlord/banner2_zps21cdb28d.png[/img][/CENTER]
[B][U]Why would you want to join?[/U][/B]
We listen to the community. The community is the most important part of any game or server and on Project-Xelios you will find yourself in one of the best RSPS communities. We also have excellent staff, and we work every day to improve our server. Project-Xelios is an economy focused server.
There are many features in-game, and you can see a list below and link with all the links needed to play.
[COLOR=#ffcc00]Links -[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img] [url=http://www.xelios.co.uk/][COLOR=#FF0000]Project-Xelios - Forums[/COLOR][/url] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img] [url=http://xelios.co.uk/play.php][COLOR=#FF0000]Project-Xelios Play Now[/COLOR][/url] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kjWch.gif[/img] [url=http://www.xelios.co.uk/vote/#?step=1][COLOR=#FF0000]Project-Xelios Vote[/COLOR][/url] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vUvnhlZ.gif[/img] [url=http://www.xelios.co.uk/highscores][COLOR=#FF0000]Project-Xelios Highscores[/COLOR][/url]
[COLOR=#0099cc]- VPS Hosted 2GB - 24/7 - No lag - Stable Economy - 100% Uptime - Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic - 138 combat, summoning counts - Constant Updates - Professional and active Staff - Active Clean Forums - Old and new Runescape Armor - DonatorZone (with shops) - Loyalty point system with shop - Various shops. - Dominion Tower - Lava Flow Mining - Jadinko Lair - Frost Dragons - Bork - Tormented Demons - New Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin) - Squeal of fortune. - Bone's on altar. - Hunter. - All the GodWars Dungeons. - Fully working Nex. - Curses, ancients etc. - Working Revenants. - Queen Black Dragon - Fight Kiln - Fight Caves - Custom Dung! - Working chaotics - Working Flowers and Dicing - Money pouch - Working clan wars! - Great staff and community - fully working slayer and slayer tower! - Auto-Voting - Auto-Donate - Great PvP and switching - Owner takes all ideas into consideration. - Perfect switching - unique home - & all the usual Matrix stuff![/COLOR]
Just a small selection of pictures below, don't call me a 'leech' or say it's a bad server before you've even tried it, maybe it's not got the most unique content ever but not many servers do, just don't give me hate.
[SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bqX3ye9.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nuiHKQZ.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hx6ngqQ.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gpKJff6.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/X45ZvZe.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/x3LqS9L.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/26zsO[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/26zrR[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/26zr5[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/26zq4[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/26zpH[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/26zpt[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/272Hu[/img][/SPOILER]
[B][U]Credits:[/U][/B] My Staff Community/players Fuzen Seth Santa Hat Jagex Matrix team.

item.title: Project-Xelios 718/742
item.dc:creator: @JamieTomlin123 JamieTomlin123
item.description:
@JamieTomlin123 wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:6, topic:540919”]Seriously? http://xelios.co.uk/forum/index.php?/topic/372-what-are-your-opinions-on-this-warning/

Only reason we posted that was because we had to, derp… it’s illegal to use their copyright material so they wanted to let everyone know that they’ll come after you eventually.[/quote]

Excuse me? I have no say in that thread it was my staff and players responding.

Personally until I read this post I didn’t even see this thread been made lol.

Bump

Just switched all my site to a new Webhost and server over to a new VPS a for better performance and no silly DC’s

Read full topic

item.title: Project-Xelios 718/742
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Seriously? http://xelios.co.uk/forum/index.php?/topic/372-what-are-your-opinions-on-this-warning/

Only reason we posted that was because we had to, derp… it’s illegal to use their copyright material so they wanted to let everyone know that they’ll come after you eventually.

Good luck with your server.

item.title: Project-Xelios 718/742
item.dc:creator: @JamieTomlin123 JamieTomlin123
item.description:
@JamieTomlin123 wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

[B][U]Why would you want to join?[/U][/B]

We listen to the community. The community is the most important part of any game or server and on Project-Xelios you will find yourself in one of the best RSPS communities. We also have excellent staff, and we work every day to improve our server. Project-Xelios is an economy focused server.

There are many features in-game, and you can see a list below and link with all the links needed to play.

[COLOR=#ffcc00]Links -[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#FF0000]Project-Xelios - Forums[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#FF0000]Project-Xelios Play Now[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#FF0000]Project-Xelios Vote[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#FF0000]Project-Xelios Highscores[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#0099cc]- VPS Hosted 2GB

  • 24/7
  • No lag
  • Stable Economy
  • 100% Uptime
  • Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic
  • 138 combat, summoning counts
  • Constant Updates
  • Professional and active Staff
  • Active Clean Forums
  • Old and new Runescape Armor
  • DonatorZone (with shops)
  • Loyalty point system with shop
  • Various shops.
  • Dominion Tower
  • Lava Flow Mining
  • Jadinko Lair
  • Frost Dragons
  • Bork
  • Tormented Demons
  • New Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin)
  • Squeal of fortune.
  • Bone’s on altar.
  • Hunter.
  • All the GodWars Dungeons.
  • Fully working Nex.
  • Curses, ancients etc.
  • Working Revenants.
  • Queen Black Dragon
  • Fight Kiln
  • Fight Caves
  • Custom Dung!
  • Working chaotics
  • Working Flowers and Dicing
  • Money pouch
  • Working clan wars!
  • Great staff and community
  • fully working slayer and slayer tower!
  • Auto-Voting
  • Auto-Donate
  • Great PvP and switching
  • Owner takes all ideas into consideration.
  • Perfect switching
  • unique home
  • & all the usual Matrix stuff![/COLOR]

Just a small selection of pictures below, don’t call me a ‘leech’ or say it’s a bad server before you’ve even tried it, maybe it’s not got the most unique content ever but not many servers do, just don’t give me hate.
